00037 GenericBoard::GenericBoard( AppSettings *p_app_settings): 
00038                                                         m_p_app_settings( p_app_settings),
00039                                                         m_template_config_file( _("")),
00040                                                         m_VCXO_types( NULL),
00041                                                         m_VCXO_types_num( 0)
00042 {
00043 
00044 }

00046 GenericBoard::~GenericBoard( )
00047 {       
00048         if( this->m_VCXO_types) 
00049         {
00050                 delete this->m_VCXO_types;
00051         }
00052         this->m_VCXO_types_num= 0;
00053 }
00054 
00055 bool GenericBoard::LoadConfig( wxConfigBase* p_config, const wxString& base_section)
00056 {
00057         /*
00058                 Application setting board parameters' file structure
00059 
00060               |- TEMPLATE_CONFIG_FILE= "vXXXX_template.txt"
00061                   |- MIN_FREQ_MHZ= 10
00062                   |- MAX_FREQ_MHZ= 100
00063                   |- VCXO_FREQ_MHZ= 1000
00064                   |- PFD_FREQ_MHZ= 10
00065                   |- PFD_FREQ_TOLERANCE_MHZ= 5
00066                   |- CLOCKOUT_DELAY_BASE_NS= 0.570
00067                   |- CLOCKOUT_DELAY_STEP_NS= 0.300
00068                   |- PRESCALER= 4
00069                   |- VCXO_TYPES_NUM= 3
00070                   |- [VCXO_TYPES]
00071                   |- [0]
00072                   |   |
00073                   |   |-- FREQ_MHZ= 1000
00074                   |- [1]
00075                   |   |
00076                   |   |-- FREQ_MHZ= 500
00077                   |- [2]
00078                   |   |
00079                   |   |-- FREQ_MHZ= 500
00080 
00081         */
00082         //
00083         // Get the configuration template file name
00084         this->m_template_config_file= _("");
00085         p_config->Read( base_section+ _("TEMPLATE_CONFIG_FILE"), &this->m_template_config_file, _(""));
00086 
00087         //
00088         // Get minimum frequency (MHz)
00089         p_config->Read( base_section+ _("MIN_FREQ_MHZ"), &this->m_min_freq, 10);
00090 
00091         //
00092         // Get maximum frequency (MHz)
00093         p_config->Read( base_section+ _("MAX_FREQ_MHZ"), &this->m_max_freq, 100);
00094 
00095         //
00096         // Get VCXO frequency (MHz)
00097         p_config->Read( base_section+ _("VCXO_FREQ_MHZ"), &this->m_VCXO_freq_MHz, 1000);
00098 
00099         //
00100         // Get PFD frequency (MHz)
00101         p_config->Read( base_section+ _("PFD_FREQ_MHZ"), &this->m_PFD_freq_MHz, 10);
00102         
00103         //
00104         // Get PFD frequency tolerance (MHz)
00105         p_config->Read( base_section+ _("PFD_FREQ_TOLERANCE_MHZ"), &this->m_PFD_freq_tolerance_MHz, 5);
00106 
00107         //
00108         // Get Clock out delay base value (nS)
00109         p_config->Read( base_section+ _("CLOCKOUT_DELAY_BASE_NS"), &this->m_clockout_delay_base_ns, 0.570);
00110 
00111         //
00112         // Get Clock out delay step (nS)
00113         p_config->Read( base_section+ _("CLOCKOUT_DELAY_STEP_NS"), &this->m_clockout_delay_step_ns, 0.300);
00114 
00115         //
00116         // Get prescaler value 
00117         //
00118         //  P =  2      ( 2/ 3)
00119         //  P =  4      ( 4/ 5)
00120         //  P =  8      ( 8/ 9)
00121         //  P = 16      (16/17)
00122         //  P = 32      (32/33)
00123         p_config->Read( base_section+ _("PRESCALER"), &this->m_prescaler, 4);
00124 
00125         this->m_VCXO_types_num= 0;
00126         p_config->Read( base_section+ _("VCXO_TYPES_NUM"), &this->m_VCXO_types_num, 0);
00127 
00128         if( this->m_VCXO_types)
00129         {
00130                 delete this->m_VCXO_types;
00131                 this->m_VCXO_types= NULL;
00132         }
00133         if( this->m_VCXO_types_num) {
00134                 this->m_VCXO_types= new int[ this->m_VCXO_types_num];
00135         }
00136         wxString vcxo_types_base_string= base_section+ _("VCXO_TYPES/");
00137         //
00138         // Vcxo Types loop
00139         for( int i= 0; i< this->m_VCXO_types_num; i++)
00140         {
00141                 wxString vcxo_string= wxString::Format( "%s%i/", vcxo_types_base_string.c_str(), i);
00142                 p_config->Read( vcxo_string+ _("FREQ_MHZ"), &this->m_VCXO_types[ i], 0);
00143         }
00144 
00145         this->UpdateParamFromTemplate();
00146 
00147         return true;
00148 }
00149 bool GenericBoard::SaveConfig( wxConfigBase* p_config, const wxString& base_section)
00150 {
00151         /*
00152                 Application setting board parameters' file structure
00153 
00154               |- TEMPLATE_CONFIG_FILE= "vXXXX_template.txt"
00155                   |- MIN_FREQ_MHZ= 10
00156                   |- MAX_FREQ_MHZ= 100
00157                   |- VCXO_FREQ_MHZ= 1000
00158                   |- PFD_FREQ_MHZ= 10
00159                   |- PFD_FREQ_TOLERANCE_MHZ= 5
00160                   |- CLOCKOUT_DELAY_BASE_NS= 0.570
00161                   |- CLOCKOUT_DELAY_STEP_NS= 0.300
00162                   |- PRESCALER= 4
00163                   |- VCXO_TYPES_NUM= 3
00164                   |- [VCXO_TYPES]
00165                   |- [0]
00166                   |   |
00167                   |   |-- FREQ_MHZ= 1000
00168                   |- [1]
00169                   |   |
00170                   |   |-- FREQ_MHZ= 500
00171                   |- [2]
00172                   |   |
00173                   |   |-- FREQ_MHZ= 500
00174         */
00175 
00176         //
00177         // Set the configuration template file name
00178         if( !p_config->Write( base_section+ _("TEMPLATE_CONFIG_FILE"), this->m_template_config_file))
00179                 return false;
00180 
00181         //
00182         // Get minimum frequency (MHz)
00183         if( !p_config->Write( base_section+ _("MIN_FREQ_MHZ"), this->m_min_freq))
00184                 return false;
00185 
00186         //
00187         // Get maximum frequency (MHz)
00188         if( !p_config->Write( base_section+ _("MAX_FREQ_MHZ"), this->m_max_freq))
00189                 return false;
00190 
00191         //
00192         // Set VCXO frequency (MHz)
00193         if( !p_config->Write( base_section+ _("VCXO_FREQ_MHZ"), this->m_VCXO_freq_MHz))
00194                 return false;
00195 
00196         //
00197         // Set PFD frequency (MHz)
00198         if( !p_config->Write( base_section+ _("PFD_FREQ_MHZ"), this->m_PFD_freq_MHz))
00199                 return false;
00200 
00201         //
00202         // Set PFD frequency tolerance (MHz)
00203         if( !p_config->Write( base_section+ _("PFD_FREQ_TOLERANCE_MHZ"), this->m_PFD_freq_tolerance_MHz))
00204                 return false;
00205 
00206         //
00207         // Set Clock out delay base value (nS)
00208         if( !p_config->Write( base_section+ _("CLOCKOUT_DELAY_BASE_NS"), this->m_clockout_delay_base_ns))
00209                 return false;
00210 
00211         //
00212         // Set Clock out delay step (nS)
00213         if( !p_config->Write( base_section+ _("CLOCKOUT_DELAY_STEP_NS"), this->m_clockout_delay_step_ns))
00214                 return false;
00215 
00216         //
00217         // Get prescaler value 
00218         //
00219         //  P =  2      ( 2/ 3)
00220         //  P =  4      ( 4/ 5)
00221         //  P =  8      ( 8/ 9)
00222         //  P = 16      (16/17)
00223         //  P = 32      (32/33)
00224         if( !p_config->Write( base_section+ _("PRESCALER"), this->m_prescaler))
00225                 return false;
00226 
00227         //
00228         // Set board number
00229         if( !p_config->Write( base_section+ _("VCXO_TYPES_NUM"), (int)this->m_VCXO_types_num))
00230                 return false;
00231 
00232         wxString vcxo_types_base_string= base_section+ _("VCXO_TYPES/");
00233         //
00234         // Boards loop
00235         for( int i= 0; i< this->m_VCXO_types_num; i++)
00236         {
00237                 wxString vcxo_string= wxString::Format( "%s%i/", vcxo_types_base_string.c_str(), i);
00238                 if( !p_config->Write( vcxo_string+ _("FREQ_MHZ"), this->m_VCXO_types[ i]))
00239                         return false;
00240         }
00241         return true;
00242 }
00243 
00244 bool GenericBoard::GetVCXOFreq( int type, int &freq_mhz) const 
00245 {
00246         if( !this->m_VCXO_types|| ( type< 0) || ( type >= this->m_VCXO_types_num) ) 
00247         {
00248                 return false;
00249         }
00250         freq_mhz= this->m_VCXO_types[ type];
00251         return true;
00252 }

00254 bool GenericBoard::DownLoadFile( const wxString &filename, UINT32 board_add)
00255 {
00256         return this->PLLUpgrade( filename.c_str(), board_add);
00257 }

00259 bool GenericBoard::UpdateParamFromTemplate()
00260 {
00261         // Update some default settings from template file
00262         wxFileName template_file_name( this->m_p_app_settings->m_template_config_folder+ this->m_template_config_file);
00263 
00264         if( !template_file_name.IsAbsolute())
00265         {
00266                 if( !template_file_name.MakeAbsolute( this->m_p_app_settings->m_root_dir))
00267                 {
00268                         wxString msg= wxString::Format( "%s: Cannot find template file '%s'.", template_file_name.GetFullPath().c_str());
00269                         wxMessageBox( msg, wxT("CAENPLLConfig"), wxOK | wxCENTRE | wxICON_ERROR  );
00270                         return false;
00271                 }
00272         }
00273 
00274         if( !template_file_name.FileExists())
00275         {
00276                 wxString msg= wxString::Format( "Cannot find template file '%s'.", template_file_name.GetFullPath().c_str());
00277                 wxMessageBox( msg, wxT("CAENPLLConfig"), wxOK | wxCENTRE | wxICON_ERROR  );
00278                 return false;
00279         }
00280         wxFileInputStream in_stream( template_file_name.GetFullPath());
00281         if( !in_stream.Ok())
00282         {
00283                 wxString msg= wxString::Format( "Cannot open template file '%s' for reading.", template_file_name.GetFullPath().c_str());
00284                 wxMessageBox( msg, wxT("CAENPLLConfig"), wxOK | wxCENTRE | wxICON_ERROR  );
00285                 return false;
00286         }
00287         wxTextInputStream text_in_stream( in_stream);
00288 
00289         wxString line;
00290         // Search for first empty line ""
00291         while( in_stream.CanRead())
00292         {
00293                 line= text_in_stream.ReadLine( );
00294                 if( !line.Trim().Cmp( "\"\""))
00295                 {
00296                         // found
00297                         break;
00298                 }
00299         }
00300 
00301         // Process tokens
00302         while( in_stream.CanRead())
00303         {
00304                 line= text_in_stream.ReadLine( ).Trim();
00305 
00306                 if( !line.Cmp( "\"\""))
00307                 {
00308                         // end of register found
00309                         break;
00310                 }
00311                 wxStringTokenizer tkz( line, ",");
00312                 if( tkz.CountTokens()!= 3)
00313                 {
00314                         // spurious lines ?
00315                         continue;
00316                 }
00317                 wxString token= tkz.NextToken().Trim();
00318                 if( token.Length()< 2)
00319                 {
00320                         // spurious lines ?
00321                         continue;
00322                 }
00323                 // remove " ... "
00324                 wxString number_token= token.Mid( 1, token.Length()- 2);
00325                 // Hex Register Address
00326                 long address= 0;
00327                 if( !number_token.ToLong( &address, 16))
00328                 {
00329                         // spurious lines ?
00330                         continue;
00331                 }
00332                 // Binary value: skip it
00333                 token= tkz.NextToken().Trim();
00334 
00335                 // Hex value
00336                 token= tkz.NextToken().Trim();
00337                 if( token.Length()< 2)
00338                 {
00339                         // spurious lines ?
00340                         continue;
00341                 }
00342                 // remove " ... "
00343                 number_token= token.Mid( 1, token.Length()- 2);
00344                 long value= 0;
00345                 if( !number_token.ToLong( &value, 16))
00346                 {
00347                         // spurious lines ?
00348                         continue;
00349                 }
00350 
00351                 unsigned char value_msk;
00352                 switch( address)
00353                 {
00354                 case 0x39:
00355                         // Reg: 0x39 Output clock Delay Ramp Capacitor [5..3] Ramp Current [2..0]
00356                         // Affected BitMask= 0x38 , 0x07
00357                         {
00358                                 value_msk= 0x38| 0x07;
00359                                 value&= ~value_msk;
00360                                 int I= value& 0x07;
00361                                 int C= ( value& 0x38)>> 3;
00362                                 double IR= 200*( I+ 1);
00363                                 double NC= 0;
00364                                 while( C)
00365                                 {
00366                                         NC+= ( C& 0x01)? 1: 0;
00367                                         C>>= 1;
00368                                 }
00369                                 NC= 3- NC+ 1;
00370 
00371                                 this->m_clockout_delay_base_ns= 0.34+ ( 1600- IR)*0.0001+ 6*(NC- 1)/IR;
00372                                 this->m_clockout_delay_step_ns= 1.3286*200*(NC+ 3)/IR/31;
00373                         }
00374                         break;
00375                 }
00376         }
00377 
00378         return true;
00379 }
00380 bool GenericBoard::MakeDownloadFile( const wxString &filename, const ConfigDoc &config)
00381 {
00382         wxFileName template_file_name( this->m_p_app_settings->m_template_config_folder+ this->m_template_config_file);
00383 
00384         if( !template_file_name.IsAbsolute())
00385         {
00386                 if( !template_file_name.MakeAbsolute( this->m_p_app_settings->m_root_dir))
00387                 {
00388                         wxString msg= wxString::Format( "Cannot find template file '%s'.", template_file_name.GetFullPath().c_str());
00389                         wxMessageBox( msg, wxT("CAENPLLConfig"), wxOK | wxCENTRE | wxICON_ERROR  );
00390                         return false;
00391                 }
00392         }
00393 
00394         if( !template_file_name.FileExists())
00395         {
00396                 wxString msg= wxString::Format( "Cannot find template file '%s'.", template_file_name.GetFullPath().c_str());
00397                 wxMessageBox( msg, wxT("CAENPLLConfig"), wxOK | wxCENTRE | wxICON_ERROR  );
00398                 return false;
00399         }
00400         wxFileInputStream in_stream( template_file_name.GetFullPath());
00401         if( !in_stream.Ok())
00402         {
00403                 wxString msg= wxString::Format( "Cannot open template file '%s' for reading.", template_file_name.GetFullPath().c_str());
00404                 wxMessageBox( msg, wxT("CAENPLLConfig"), wxOK | wxCENTRE | wxICON_ERROR  );
00405                 return false;
00406         }
00407         wxTextInputStream text_in_stream( in_stream);
00408 
00409         wxFileOutputStream out_stream( filename);
00410 
00411         if( !out_stream.Ok())
00412         {
00413                 wxString msg= wxString::Format( "Cannot open download file '%s' for writing.", filename.c_str());
00414                 wxMessageBox( msg, wxT("CAENPLLConfig"), wxOK | wxCENTRE | wxICON_ERROR  );
00415                 return false;
00416         }
00417         wxTextOutputStream text_out_stream( out_stream);
00418         // Parse template file and make new download file
00419 
00420         wxString line;
00421         // Search for first empty line ""
00422         while( in_stream.CanRead())
00423         {
00424                 line= text_in_stream.ReadLine( );
00425                 text_out_stream<< line<< '\n';
00426 
00427                 if( !line.Trim().Cmp( "\"\""))
00428                 {
00429                         // found
00430                         break;
00431                 }
00432         }
00434         //while( in_stream.CanRead())
00435         //{
00436         //      line= text_in_stream.ReadLine( );
00437         //      text_out_stream<< line<< '\n';
00438         //      wxStringTokenizer tkz( line.Trim(), ",");
00439         //      if( tkz.CountTokens()!= 3)
00440         //      {
00441         //              // found
00442         //              break;
00443         //      }
00444         //}
00445 
00446         // Calculate divider
00447         int R= 1, N= 1;
00448         float Fin_pll= config.GetInputClock();
00449         if( config.GetPLLMode()) {
00450                 // PLL mode
00451                 float f_vcxo= config.GetVCXOFreq();
00452                 if( !GenericBoard::ApproximateFin( Fin_pll, f_vcxo, this->m_PFD_freq_MHz, this->m_PFD_freq_tolerance_MHz, R, N)) {
00453                         wxMessageBox( _("Cannot get a valid dividers set and/or PFD frequency for the specified input clock value."), wxT("CAENPLLConfig"), wxOK | wxCENTRE | wxICON_ERROR  );
00454                         return false;
00455                 }
00456         }
00457 
00458         //K= 1;
00459         //double Fin_pll= this->m_VCXO_freq_MHz/ (double)K;
00460         //R= (int)( double)( Fin_pll/ this->m_PFD_freq_MHz);
00461         //if( R& ~0x3fff)
00462         //{
00463         //      wxLogError( _("R value too large!"));
00464         //      return false;
00465         //}
00466         //N= K* R;
00467         int counter_A, counter_B;
00468         if( this->m_prescaler== 0)
00469         {
00470                 wxLogError( _("Invalid prescaler value !"));
00471                 return false;
00472         }
00473         int P= this->m_prescaler;
00474         counter_B= N/ P;
00475         counter_A= N- counter_B* P;
00476 
00477         if( counter_A& ~0x3f)
00478         {
00479                 wxLogError( _("Counter A value too large! Increase prescaler value !"));
00480                 return false;
00481         }
00482         if( counter_B& ~0x1fff)
00483         {
00484                 wxLogError( _("Counter B value too large! Increase prescaler value !"));
00485                 return false;
00486         }
00487         // Process tokens
00488         while( in_stream.CanRead())
00489         {
00490                 line= text_in_stream.ReadLine( ).Trim();
00491 
00492                 if( !line.Cmp( "\"\""))
00493                 {
00494                         // end of register found
00495                         text_out_stream<< line<< '\n';
00496                         break;
00497                 }
00498                 wxStringTokenizer tkz( line, ",");
00499                 if( tkz.CountTokens()!= 3)
00500                 {
00501                         // spurious lines ?
00502                         text_out_stream<< line<< '\n';
00503                         continue;
00504                 }
00505                 wxString token= tkz.NextToken().Trim();
00506                 if( token.Length()< 2)
00507                 {
00508                         // spurious lines ?
00509                         text_out_stream<< line<< '\n';
00510                         continue;
00511                 }
00512                 // remove " ... "
00513                 wxString number_token= token.Mid( 1, token.Length()- 2);
00514                 //if( !number_token.IsNumber())
00515                 //{
00516                 //      // spurious lines ?
00517                 //      text_out_stream<< line<< '\n';
00518                 //      continue;
00519                 //}
00520                 // Hex Register Address
00521                 long address= 0;
00522                 if( !number_token.ToLong( &address, 16))
00523                 {
00524                         // spurious lines ?
00525                         text_out_stream<< line<< '\n';
00526                         continue;
00527                 }
00528                 // Binary value: skip it
00529                 token= tkz.NextToken().Trim();
00530 
00531                 // Hex value
00532                 token= tkz.NextToken().Trim();
00533                 if( token.Length()< 2)
00534                 {
00535                         // spurious lines ?
00536                         text_out_stream<< line<< '\n';
00537                         continue;
00538                 }
00539                 // remove " ... "
00540                 number_token= token.Mid( 1, token.Length()- 2);
00541                 //if( !number_token.IsNumber())
00542                 //{
00543                 //      // spurious lines ?
00544                 //      text_out_stream<< line<< '\n';
00545                 //      continue;
00546                 //}
00547                 long value= 0;
00548                 if( !number_token.ToLong( &value, 16))
00549                 {
00550                         // spurious lines ?
00551                         text_out_stream<< line<< '\n';
00552                         continue;
00553                 }
00554 
00555                 char bin_buff[ 9];
00556                 unsigned char value_msk;
00557                 switch( address)
00558                 {
00559                 case 0x04:
00560                         //  Reg: 0x04  N divider Counter A ( 6 LSb )
00561                         //      bit [0..5]
00562                         value_msk= 0x3f;
00563                         value&= ~value_msk;
00564                         value|= (unsigned char)(counter_A& value_msk);
00565                         text_out_stream<< wxString::Format( "\"%02X\",\"%s\",\"%02X\"", address, BinFormat( (unsigned char)value, bin_buff), value)<< '\n';
00566                         break;
00567                 case 0x05:
00568                         //  Reg: 0x05  N divider Counter B MSB  ( 5 LSb )
00569                         //      0x05   -> MSB bit [0..4]
00570                         //      0x06   -> LSB bit [0..7]
00571                         value_msk= 0x1f;
00572                         value&= ~value_msk;
00573                         value|= (unsigned char)((int)( counter_B>> 8)& value_msk);
00574                         text_out_stream<< wxString::Format( "\"%02X\",\"%s\",\"%02X\"", address, BinFormat( (unsigned char)value, bin_buff), value)<< '\n';
00575                         break;
00576                 case 0x06:
00577                         //  Reg: 0x05  N divider Counter B LSB
00578                         //      0x05   -> MSB bit [0..4]
00579                         //      0x06   -> LSB bit [0..7]
00580                         value_msk= 0xff;
00581                         value&= ~value_msk;
00582                         value|= (unsigned char)( counter_B& value_msk);
00583                         text_out_stream<< wxString::Format( "\"%02X\",\"%s\",\"%02X\"", address, BinFormat( (unsigned char)value, bin_buff), value)<< '\n';
00584                         break;
00585                 case 0x0b:
00586                         //  Reg: 0x0b  R divider MSB  ( 6 LSb )
00587                         //      0x0b   -> MSB bit [0..5]
00588                         //      0x0c   -> LSB bit [0..7]
00589                         value_msk= 0x3f;
00590                         value&= ~value_msk;
00591                         value|= (unsigned char)((int)( R>> 8)& value_msk);
00592                         text_out_stream<< wxString::Format( "\"%02X\",\"%s\",\"%02X\"", address, BinFormat( (unsigned char)value, bin_buff), value)<< '\n';
00593                         break;
00594 
00595                 case 0x0c:
00596                         //  Reg: 0x0c  R divider LSB
00597                         //      0x0b   -> MSB bit [0..5]
00598                         //      0x0c   -> LSB bit [0..7]
00599                         value_msk= 0xff;
00600                         value&= ~value_msk;
00601                         value|= (unsigned char)( R& value_msk);
00602                         text_out_stream<< wxString::Format( "\"%02X\",\"%s\",\"%02X\"", address, BinFormat( (unsigned char)value, bin_buff), value)<< '\n';
00603                         break;
00604                 case 0x38:
00605                         // Reg: 0x38 Output clock Delay [6] bypass
00606                         // Affected BitMask= 0x01
00607                         value_msk= 0x01;
00608                         value&= ~value_msk;
00609                         value|= !config.GetClockOutDelayEnable()? value_msk: 0x00;
00610                         text_out_stream<< wxString::Format( "\"%02X\",\"%s\",\"%02X\"", address, BinFormat( (unsigned char)value, bin_buff), value)<< '\n';
00611                         break;
00612                 case 0x3A:
00613                         // Reg: 0x3A Output clock Delay [1..5] fine adjust
00614                         // Affected BitMask= 0x3e
00615                         value_msk= 0x3e;
00616                         value&= ~value_msk;
00617                         value|= (unsigned char)( config.GetClockOutDelay()<< 1)& value_msk;
00618                         text_out_stream<< wxString::Format( "\"%02X\",\"%s\",\"%02X\"", address, BinFormat( (unsigned char)value, bin_buff), value)<< '\n';
00619                         break;
00620                 case 0x42:
00621                         // Reg: 0x42 CLOCK_OUT enable
00622                         // set bit 0 to enable
00623                         value_msk= 0x01;
00624                         value&= ~value_msk;
00625                         value|= !config.GetClockOutEnable()? 0x01: 0x00;
00626                         text_out_stream<< wxString::Format( "\"%02X\",\"%s\",\"%02X\"", address, BinFormat( (unsigned char)value, bin_buff), value)<< '\n';
00627                         break;
00628                 case 0x45:
00629                         // Reg: 0x45 Pll mode= 0x02 Bypass mode: 0x1d 
00630                         // Affected BitMask= 0x1f
00631                         value_msk= 0x1f;
00632                         value&= ~value_msk;
00633                         value|= config.GetPLLMode()? 0x02: 0x1d;
00634                         text_out_stream<< wxString::Format( "\"%02X\",\"%s\",\"%02X\"", address, BinFormat( (unsigned char)value, bin_buff), value)<< '\n';
00635                         break;
00636                 case 0x48:
00637                 case 0x4a:
00638                 case 0x4c:
00639                 case 0x4e:
00640                         // Reg: 0x48, 0x4a, 0x4c, 0x4e Divider [0..3]: Low cycle [7..4] High cycle [3..0]
00641                         // Affected BitMask= 0xff
00642                         value_msk= 0xff;
00643                         value&= ~value_msk;
00644                         {
00645                                 int divider= config.GetADCDivider();
00646                                 if( divider< 2)
00647                                         divider= 2;
00648                                 int low_cycles= divider>> 1;
00649                                 int high_cycles= divider- low_cycles;
00650                                 value|= (unsigned char)( ( (high_cycles- 1)<< 4)| ( low_cycles-1));
00651                         }
00652                         text_out_stream<< wxString::Format( "\"%02X\",\"%s\",\"%02X\"", address, BinFormat( (unsigned char)value, bin_buff), value)<< '\n';
00653                         break;
00654                 case 0x49:
00655                 case 0x4b:
00656                 case 0x4d:
00657                 case 0x4f:
00658                         // Reg: 0x49, 0x4b, 0x4d, 0x4f Divider [0..3] bypass
00659                         // Affected BitMask= 0x80
00660                         value_msk= 0x80;
00661                         value&= ~value_msk;
00662                         value|= ( config.GetADCDivider()== 1)? value_msk: 0x00;
00663                         text_out_stream<< wxString::Format( "\"%02X\",\"%s\",\"%02X\"", address, BinFormat( (unsigned char)value, bin_buff), value)<< '\n';
00664                         break;
00665                 case 0x52:
00666                         // Reg: 0x52 FPGA Divider [5]: Low cycle [7..4] High cycle [3..0]
00667                         // Affected BitMask= 0xff
00668                         value_msk= 0xff;
00669                         value&= ~value_msk;
00670                         {
00671                                 int divider= (int)((double)config.GetADCDivider()* this->GetFPGADivider());
00672                                 if( divider< 2)
00673                                         divider= 2;
00674                                 int low_cycles= divider>> 1;
00675                                 int high_cycles= divider- low_cycles;
00676                                 value|= (unsigned char)( ( (high_cycles- 1)<< 4)| ( low_cycles-1));
00677                         }
00678                         text_out_stream<< wxString::Format( "\"%02X\",\"%s\",\"%02X\"", address, BinFormat( (unsigned char)value, bin_buff), value)<< '\n';
00679                         break;
00680                 case 0x53:
00681                         // Reg: 0x53 FPGA Divider [5] bypass
00682                         // Affected BitMask= 0x80
00683                         value_msk= 0x80;
00684                         value&= ~value_msk;
00685                         value|= ( ( (int)((double)config.GetADCDivider()* this->GetFPGADivider())) == 1)? value_msk: 0x00;
00686                         text_out_stream<< wxString::Format( "\"%02X\",\"%s\",\"%02X\"", address, BinFormat( (unsigned char)value, bin_buff), value)<< '\n';
00687                         break;
00688                 case 0x54:
00689                         // Reg: 0x54 Output clock Divider [6]: Low cycle [7..4] High cycle [3..0]
00690                         // Affected BitMask= 0xff
00691                         value_msk= 0xff;
00692                         value&= ~value_msk;
00693                         {
00694                                 int divider= config.GetClockOutDivider();
00695                                 if( divider< 2)
00696                                         divider= 2;
00697                                 int low_cycles= divider>> 1;
00698                                 int high_cycles= divider- low_cycles;
00699                                 value|= (unsigned char)( ( (high_cycles- 1)<< 4)| ( low_cycles-1));
00700                         }
00701                         text_out_stream<< wxString::Format( "\"%02X\",\"%s\",\"%02X\"", address, BinFormat( (unsigned char)value, bin_buff), value)<< '\n';
00702                         break;
00703                 case 0x55:
00704                         // Reg: 0x55 Output clock Divider [6] bypass
00705                         // Affected BitMask= 0x80
00706                         value_msk= 0x80;
00707                         value&= ~value_msk;
00708                         value|= !config.GetClockOutEnable()? value_msk: 0x00;
00709                         text_out_stream<< wxString::Format( "\"%02X\",\"%s\",\"%02X\"", address, BinFormat( (unsigned char)value, bin_buff), value)<< '\n';
00710                         break;
00711                 default:
00712                         text_out_stream<< line<< '\n';
00713                         break;
00714                 }
00715         }
00716 
00717         // Process tokens
00718         while( in_stream.CanRead())
00719         {
00720                 line= text_in_stream.ReadLine( ).Trim();
00721 
00722                 if( !line.Cmp( "\"\""))
00723                 {
00724                         // end of register found
00725                         text_out_stream<< line<< '\n';
00726                         break;
00727                 }
00728                 wxStringTokenizer tkz( line, ",");
00729                 if( tkz.CountTokens()!= 2)
00730                 {
00731                         // spurious lines ?
00732                         text_out_stream<< line<< '\n';
00733                         continue;
00734                 }
00735                 wxString token= tkz.NextToken().Trim();
00736                 if( !token.Upper().Cmp("\"REFIN:\"")||
00737                         !token.Upper().Cmp("\"CLKINP1:\""))
00738                 {
00739                         float freq;
00740                         if( config.GetPLLMode())
00741                         {
00742                                 freq= Fin_pll;
00743                         }
00744                         else
00745                         {
00746                                 freq= config.GetInputClock();
00747                         }
00748                         text_out_stream<< token<< ','<< freq<< '\n';
00749             // HACK: se ci forssero problemi con la stampa dei float con separatore virgola.  
00750             //text_out_stream<< token<< ','<< wxString::Format("%f",freq) << '\n';
00751                 }
00752                 else if( !token.Upper().Cmp("\"CLKINP2:\""))
00753                 {
00754                         //int freq= this->m_VCXO_freq_MHz;
00755             float f_vcxo= config.GetVCXOFreq();
00756                         text_out_stream<< token<< ','<< (int)f_vcxo << '\n';
00757                 }
00758                 else
00759                 {
00760                         text_out_stream<< line<< '\n';
00761                 }
00762         }
00763         return true;
00764 }
00765 bool GenericBoard::ReadVCXOType( int &type, UINT32 board_add) const {
00766 
00767         VMEWrapper vme_wrapper;
00768         InputData in_data;
00769         strncpy( in_data.m_board_type, this->m_p_app_settings->GetVMEBoardTypeString().c_str(), sizeof( in_data.m_board_type));
00770         in_data.m_vme_board_num= this->m_p_app_settings->GetVMEBoardNum();
00771         in_data.m_vme_link= this->m_p_app_settings->GetVMELink();
00772         in_data.m_board_base_add= board_add;
00773         
00774         if( !vme_wrapper.Init( in_data))
00775                 return false;
00776 
00777         UINT32 reg_value= 0;
00778         if( !vme_wrapper.ReadReg( CVT_V1724_ROM_VCXO_TYPE_ADD, reg_value))
00779         {
00780                 wxLogError( _("ReadReg: CVT_V1724_ROM_VCXO_TYPE_ADD read failed !"));
00781                 return false;
00782         }
00783         
00784         type= reg_value& 0x000000ff;
00785         return true;
00786 }
00787 
00788 bool GenericBoard::PLLUpgrade( const char* filename, UINT32 board_add)
00789 {
00790         bool ret= true;
00791         UINT8 page[ V1724_FLASH_PAGE_SIZE];
00792         char file_line[300];
00793         // int org_line= 15;
00794         int i;
00795         int data_size;
00796         FILE *from= ( FILE *)0;
00797         VMEWrapper vme_wrapper;
00798 
00799         InputData in_data;
00800         strncpy( in_data.m_board_type, this->m_p_app_settings->GetVMEBoardTypeString().c_str(), sizeof( in_data.m_board_type));
00801         in_data.m_vme_board_num= this->m_p_app_settings->GetVMEBoardNum();
00802         in_data.m_vme_link= this->m_p_app_settings->GetVMELink();
00803         in_data.m_board_base_add= board_add;
00804         
00805         if( !vme_wrapper.Init( in_data))
00806                 return false;
00807 
00808         if( ( from= fopen( filename, "rt"))== NULL)
00809         {
00810                 wxLogError( _("PLLUpgrade: file open failure!"));
00811                 ret= false;
00812                 goto exit_point;
00813         }
00814         // Strip header lines
00815         for( i= 0; i< 4; i++)
00816         {
00817                 if( fgets( file_line, 300, from)== NULL)
00818                 {
00819                         wxLogError( _("PLLUpgrade: bad file format !"));
00820                         ret= false;
00821                         goto exit_point;                                                
00822                 }
00823         }
00824         data_size= 0;
00825         // Get data lines
00826         while( TRUE)
00827         {
00828                 char *token;
00829                 char *trash;
00830                 int value;
00831                 if( fgets( file_line, 300, from)== NULL)
00832                 {
00833                         if( !feof( from))
00834                         {
00835                                 wxLogError( _("PLLUpgrade: file read error !"));
00836                                 ret= false;
00837                                 goto exit_point;
00838                         }
00839                         break;
00840                 }
00841                 if( data_size>= V1724_FLASH_PAGE_SIZE)
00842                 {
00843                         wxLogError( _("PLLUpgrade: file too large for flash page size !"));
00844                         ret= false;
00845                         goto exit_point;
00846                 }
00847                 // Get Address
00848                 token= strtok( file_line, ",");
00849                 // Skip a value
00850                 trash= strtok( NULL, ",");
00851 
00852                 if( ( token== 0)|| (trash== 0))
00853                         break;
00854                 if( !strcmp( token, "\"\""))
00855                         break;
00856                 sscanf( token, "\"%x\"", &value);
00857                 page[ data_size++]= value& 0xff;
00858 
00859                 // Get value
00860                 token= strtok( NULL, ",");
00861                 sscanf( token, "\"%x\"", &value);
00862                 page[ data_size++]= value& 0xff;
00863         }
00864 
00865         if( !this->WriteFlashPage( page, CVT_V1724_PLL_FLASH_PAGE, vme_wrapper))
00866         {
00867                 wxLogError( _("PLLUpgrade: flash write failed !"));
00868                 ret= false;
00869                 goto exit_point;
00870         }
00871 
00872         //
00873         // Reload configuration
00874         {
00875                 UINT32 reg_value32= 0;
00876                 if( !vme_wrapper.WriteReg( CVT_V1724_RELOAD_CONFIG_ADD, reg_value32))
00877                 {
00878                         wxLogError( _("PLLUpgrade: RELOAD_CONFIG write failed !"));
00879                         ret= false;
00880                         goto exit_point;
00881                 }
00882         }
00883 exit_point:
00884         if( from)
00885         {
00886                 fclose( from);
00887         }
00888         vme_wrapper.End( );
00889 
00890         return ret;
00891 }
00892 bool GenericBoard::WriteFlashPage( const UINT8* page_buff, UINT32 page_index, VMEWrapper& vme_wrapper)
00893 {
00894         int i;
00895         UINT32 reg_value;
00896         UINT32 flash_addr;
00897         bool ret_val= true;
00898 
00899         flash_addr= page_index << 9;
00900 
00901         //
00902         // enable flash
00903         reg_value= CVT_V1724_FLEN_EN_MSK;
00904         if( !vme_wrapper.ClearBitmaskReg( CVT_V1724_FLASH_EN_ADD, reg_value))
00905         {
00906                 wxLogError( _("WriteFlashPage: CVT_V1724_FLASH_EN write failed !"));
00907                 return false;
00908         }
00909 
00910         // write opcode
00911         reg_value= CVT_V1724_FOP_PAGE_PROG_TH_BUF1;
00912         if( !vme_wrapper.WriteReg( CVT_V1724_FLASH_DATA_ADD, reg_value))
00913         {
00914                 wxLogError( _("WriteFlashPage: CVT_V1724_FLASH write failed !"));
00915                 ret_val= false;
00916                 goto exit_point;
00917         }
00918         // write address
00919         reg_value= (unsigned char)( flash_addr>> 16);
00920         if( !vme_wrapper.WriteReg( CVT_V1724_FLASH_DATA_ADD, reg_value))
00921         {
00922                 wxLogError( _("WriteFlashPage: CVT_V1724_FLASH write failed !"));
00923                 ret_val= false;
00924                 goto exit_point;
00925         }
00926         reg_value= (unsigned char)( flash_addr>> 8);
00927         if( !vme_wrapper.WriteReg( CVT_V1724_FLASH_DATA_ADD, reg_value))
00928         {
00929                 wxLogError( _("WriteFlashPage: CVT_V1724_FLASH write failed !"));
00930                 ret_val= false;
00931                 goto exit_point;
00932         }
00933         reg_value= (unsigned char) flash_addr;
00934         if( !vme_wrapper.WriteReg( CVT_V1724_FLASH_DATA_ADD, reg_value))
00935         {
00936                 wxLogError( _("WriteFlashPage: CVT_V1724_FLASH write failed !"));
00937                 ret_val= false;
00938                 goto exit_point;
00939         }
00940         // write flash page
00941         for (i= 0; i< V1724_FLASH_PAGE_SIZE; i++)
00942         {
00943                 reg_value= page_buff[ i];
00944                 if( !vme_wrapper.WriteReg( CVT_V1724_FLASH_DATA_ADD, reg_value))
00945                 {
00946                         wxLogError( _("WriteFlashPage: CVT_V1724_FLASH write failed !"));
00947                         ret_val= false;
00948                         goto exit_point;
00949                 }
00950         }
00951 
00952 exit_point:
00953         // disable flash
00954         reg_value= CVT_V1724_FLEN_EN_MSK;
00955         if( !vme_wrapper.SetBitmaskReg( CVT_V1724_FLASH_EN_ADD, reg_value))
00956         {
00957                 wxLogError( _("WriteFlashPage: CVT_V1724_FLASH_EN write failed !"));
00958                 ret_val= false;
00959         }
00960 
00961         // wait 50ms
00962         ::wxMilliSleep( 50);
00963         return ret_val;
00964 }
00965 bool GenericBoard::ApproximateFin( float &f_in, float f_vcxo, float f_pfd, float f_pfd_tolerance, int &R, int &N) {
00966         /*
00967                 Gets the input f_in and return the approximated value to satisfy the flooawing constraints:
00968                         f_in= f_vcxo* R/ N   R| min( abs( f_in/R- f_pfd))
00969                 f_in must be initialized on init and will be updated on successfull exit
00970         */
00971         if( f_in<= 0) {
00972                 return false;
00973         }
00974         double min_err= 99999;
00975         double new_err;
00976         float approx_f_in, org_f_in;
00977         int r, n;
00978 
00979         org_f_in= f_in;
00980         for( r= 1; r<= 0x3fff; r++) {
00981                 n= (int)(double)(( f_vcxo* (double)r)/ (double)org_f_in);
00982                 if( n< 1) {
00983                         continue;
00984                 }
00985                 approx_f_in= ( f_vcxo* r)/ n;
00986                 new_err= fabs( approx_f_in/ (double)r- (double)f_pfd);
00987                 if( ( new_err< min_err)&& ( new_err< f_pfd_tolerance)) {
00988                         R= r;
00989                         N= n;
00990                         f_in= approx_f_in;
00991                         min_err= new_err;
00992                         if( min_err< 0.000001) {
00993                                 break;
00994                         }
00995                 }
00996         }
00997         return min_err!= 99999;
00998 }
